description: Short hike with great trailhead, close to highway. But great elevation gain basically right from the start, so a good workout.
directions: (from Canada, Montreal) Take Hwy 87 south, exit 30. Take hyw 9 NW, then 73 (ie. Drive towards Keene Valley) to vicinity of Ausable Club. trailhead on right, 'Giant Mountain , Roaring Brook'
title: Giant Mountain
